content.body: I've been dogfooding my TypeScript support for pipeline operator at https://github.com/Pokute/AoC2021/blob/main/4.ts . It's starting to feel crucial for me. Lacking tacit function application (`|>>`) would be an inconvenience, but the other way around, I would have so many IIAFEs.
content.formatted_body: I've been dogfooding my TypeScript support for pipeline operator at https://github.com/Pokute/AoC2021/blob/main/4.ts . It's starting to feel crucial for me. Lacking tacit function application (|>>) would be an inconvenience, but the other way around, I would have so many IIAFEs.
